alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Garfield; Northern Phillips; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 2:40AM MST until February 21 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Petroleum, Garfield, and Phillips Counties. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. Cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
